text: Mulhouse-Habsheim is a small airport, in Habsheim, near Mulhouse. It used to be a military base. The runway has a length of . Today, it is mainly used for light aircraft. On 26 June 1998, Air France Flight 296 crashed near the airport, at an airshow. Category:Airports in France Category:Haut-Rhin
